title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for Ollama; chat, embed, pull & manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node, Bun, Deno and browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use Ollama models as LLM or chat backend in chains & agents.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model manager, RAG, dark mode, multi-user).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM SDK for Ollama; Kotlin & Spring Boot examples included.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI for chatting with Ollama models, history, syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Turn any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot replacement inside VS Code.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Plug-and-play RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + LangChain.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-nvim
summary: Neovim plugin to generate code, refactor, or chat with any Ollama model from within the editor.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with async streaming, chat & embed APIs, dependency injection ready.

title: ollama-django
summary: Django app + REST API that wraps Ollama for chat, completions and model management.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds an Ollama chat pane and template commands for note assistance.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Lightweight Rust crate providing typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that streams Ollama replies in threads or slash commands.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot adapter for Ollama; mention the bot or DM it to chat with any local model.

title: ollama-telegram
summary: Telegram bot with group & private chat support, streaming, and per-user model selection.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in production pipelines.

title: awesome-ollama
summary: Curated list of tools, libraries, tutorials, and projects in the growing Ollama ecosystem.
